comment.author: 28218925@N05
comment._content: Greetings! Using the "blog this" function above your picture, we have linked your picture to our NOT-for-profit blog [THE WORLD'S GAZE] in which we are showcasing some of the GEMS found in Flickr. You have been given FULL credit for the work and the image is linked back to your photo on your Flickr account. Should you object, we will remove the link immediately. In anticipation, please receive our best wishes. Cordially yours, The World's Gaze PS: In order to find your picture on our blog, if it is located past the front page, enter your Flickr identity or the title of the picture in the search field.
